content.title: Map the Service with UI Elements
content.body:
Map the following elements in the Mapping Editor from the left pane to the right pane.

  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, select AccountNumber{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblAccountNumber and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, select Balance{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblBalance and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, select AccountName{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblAccountName and select text{string}.
